#summary The road ahead for KouChat
#labels Featured

= Roadmap =

This is my current plan for the future of KouChat. Don't rely on this plan! It can and probably will change, but I thought some of you might be interested in the road ahead. No dates are set, and that's on purpose. It's done when it's done :)

If you have any suggestions, please use the issue tracker.


== Version 1.2.0 ==

  * Animated system tray icon (issue 11)
  * Multi-line messages (issue 12)
  * Show/Hide menu items in the system tray right click menu
  * Fix Event Dispatch Thread usage
  * User specified network interface
  * Test KouInject


== Version 2.0 ==

  * Direct TCP/IP connection to users
  * Point to point encryption (issue 4)
  * Send all files in folder
  * Only see users in specified group


== Version 2.1 ==

  * Internationalization
